answerText: nuclear receptors [don't accept "nucleus receptor"][10] Many nuclear receptors form one of these structures as a part of activation. These are structures that consist of two monomer components that are not necessarily covalently linked.

subject: Science
question: Question: This style of receptor transduces glucocorticoid and retinoid signals. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of receptor can enter a certain structure and bind directly to DNA.
